website_summaries.verdict: Create flavorful Louisiana-style hot sauces using aged, crushed cayenne peppers.
pros: Sauces give any food a kick
Even tasty dribbled over eggs to add some zip
Can also be used as terrific marinades for meat, pork, and chicken
cons: Glass bottles would be better than plastic
Sauces may be too  mild for some

customer_reviews.title: a bit more vinegar than many hot sauces - but a really good vinegar taste
customer_reviews.text: Incredible flavor, a bit more vinegar than many hot sauces - but a really good vinegar taste! . My husband raves every time he uses it. My son also really like the garlic hot sauce (we did the gift box too). After you try this, Louisiana hot sauce (or the other dozen standard store varieties) absolutely will not stand up. I bought this the first time as a novelty stocking stuffer for adults, but never expected the rave reviews. My husband mentioned he would buy this in a gallon jug if available. I'm not a huge fan of any hot sauce personally, but must admit this stuff is really good. I would 100% recommend trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: lisajotheshoppinghoTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: degree of hotness and consistency is right on and the label is great as an added bonus
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Golds Hot Sauce user but your Zombie Cajun Hot Pepper Sauce has won me over. The flavor, degree of hotness and consistency is right on and the label is great as an added bonus. We had a Bloody Mary competition at Hop-O-Nose marina on Saturday between all the boat owners. I always have made a Cajun style Bloody Mary which everyone loved but when I replaced the Golds with Zombie Cajun it took it over the top and we won hands down! There was some very stiff competition but all agreed the Zombie Cajun was the best ever. Your sauce has now replaced all others in our house. Thank you for the buzz.
customer_reviews.author: The Baron Krelve

customer_reviews.title: Not too hot, awesome flavor.
customer_reviews.text: There is something special about this hot sauce. I typically like hot sauce to be very hot, somewhere between habenero and ghost pepper range, and even though this sauce is not in that range, the flavor is so good that it is a worthy addition to the foods you like to sauce up (pizza, eggs, etc.). Zombie gimmick is interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A different kind of Cajun sauce!
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot! It has an excellent consistency and a very deep, well rounded chili flavor. It has good heat without being numbing or burning. It is also blends very well with food because it is not too vinegary. I can taste the salt, but it is not too salty and the salt helps balance the taste. Most hot sauces set the serving size just at 1 Tsp. Zombie Cajun sets their serving size at 1 Tbsp, which is much more in keeping with how hot sauce should be used in my judgment. Excellent sauce! Thank you so much! --Eric
customer_reviews.author: Eric English

customer_reviews.title: This is my third order of Zombie.
customer_reviews.text: I have turned a number of friends on to Zombie. Now give them as gifts. Great flavor great product.
customer_reviews.author: grandpa cat

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not spicy,has a heavy vinegar taste. If thats your jam its for u,safly my husband doeant like vinegar bases so thisbwas not a fit for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Be careful how much you use in whatever your cooking. This is the real deal in hot sauces.
customer_reviews.text: If I'm in the mood for hot, I'll use it in what ever dish I'm preparing whenever meat is involved.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Approved by no less than THREE hot sauce fanatics
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 bottles of Zombie Cajun hot sauce as a gift for a friend who is a complete hot sauce FIEND. I mean, he drinks the stuff, literally. I thought this product looked really promising, and it's gluten free (a must for my friend). He absolutely, positively, ENTHUSIASTICALLY loves it! He raves. His parents stopped by and he shared some with them. They are both hot sauce connoisseurs. Verdict? ADORE! So you have the emphatic thumbs up from not one, not two, but three passionate hot sauce lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Cannibal Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sauce and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sauces! My favorite is the "Dual protection garlic" Has a wonderful flavor. They not only make the best sauce but have EXCELLENT customer service. I had an issue with how Amazon shipped it to me and the Zombie cajun folks responded right away and sent me a new one ...packaged perfectly. I just got my bro-in-law hooked on these too. He is a hot sauce die hard...He really likes the "The Antidote" its too hot for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It's very spicy, and not too hot.
customer_reviews.text: Very intense flavor, and nice depth and complexity of pepper flavors. It's not too hot, but there is heat balanced in with the pepper flavors on the palate. I like the size of bottle opening, in that you can glop a lot of the sauce on to your food if you wish. Everybody at our table likes this stuff. A drop or two, or three in a *Bloody* is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Chandon

customer_reviews.title: Not very flavorful
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is bland. Also, they come in plastic bottles which I really don’t like. But it’s not as salty as other hot sauce I guess. I won’t repurchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: TJ & Olivia

customer_reviews.title: EXPENSIVE FRANKS RED HOT SAUCE
customer_reviews.text: AKA. FRANKS. RED HOT. AT YOUR LOCAL. SUPERMARKET. SAVE YOUR MONEY. OR BUY FRANKS FOR MUCH LESS
customer_reviews.author: abba

customer_reviews.title: SO FREAKING GOOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hot sauce! I like my sauce spicy but not so spicy it hurts and this is just the right amount of spicy. And I love that its not overpowered by vinegar like a lot of other sauces. I can actually taste the peppers and not just the vinegar. And the founder, Ricky, is so nice, responding to my email promptly. Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce is definitely my new favorite hot sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Too much vinegar
customer_reviews.text: The vinegar is definitely overpowering and this is a little too mild for my taste....still tasty tho. I would recommend the hotter version, it has better flavor and that one is not too hot (more like medium if you dont use too much).
customer_reviews.author: Jason A

customer_reviews.title: I like it hot
customer_reviews.text: I like it hot. I also like flavor. This hot sauce has both heat and flavor. So many other hot sauces miss the point of being a flavor enhancer and just focus on heat. Zombie Cajun is my new "go to" sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: ... on all the positive reviews and I was NOT disappointed. Excellent flavor and the shipping was prompt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product based on all the positive reviews and I was NOT disappointed. Excellent flavor and the shipping was prompt. Lost a star because the lid (cap) on the product was loose and some product leaked into the package. Other than that I am extremely happy with my purchase and will order again. Did I mention the excellent flavor? Not too hot (but definitely spicy) and tastes great! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Hot Sauces I've had in a While
customer_reviews.text: Over the last few days I've put this sauce on everything; mac and cheese, eggs and chicken strips to name a few things. Unlike other hot sauces out there, Zombie has the bite up front, allowing you to enjoy the taste of your food, whatever it is you're eating. So many hot sauces are overpowering or overly vinegary; Zombie Cajun offers that heat you crave without covering up the flavor of what you are eating.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Lo Pinto

customer_reviews.title: A very solid entry into the Louisiana side of things ...
customer_reviews.text: A very solid entry into the Louisiana side of things, but nothing mind-blowing here. Feel free to check my hot sauce b-log at d-dubtsaaf DOT blogspot DOT com, if you're interest in further thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hot sauce!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to spice my Walking Dead Chili and found this gem hiding here, had to get some. Needles to say, it was great! If I had to make a comparison, Crystals hot sauce is similar, but I find this one has more kick to it. I add this to a variety of dishes now that I want a extra spice in. The story is very unique too, was not expecting that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry E. Battles Jr.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Cayenne hot sauce
customer_reviews.text: The sauce showed up in Suggestions, so I bought one to try it out -- I love Cayenne pepper hot sauces. After I unwrapped it and took a spoonful for a taste, I immediately ordered three more. I put it on chicken and fish, and add some to salad dressings. This is my favorite-tasting hot sauce, but it has been supplanted by the Zombie Cajun Lagniappe sauce. Same great taste, and thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Rakman

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Very good hot sauce. Not too much heat but packed with great flavor. I do not like a hot sauce that punishes you for eating it. I don't get the point in eating something that leaves you crying... This does a great job at giving your food a good kick of heat with a great spiced yet slightly sweet flavor. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: F. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: This isn't too bad
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a huge kick out of those sauce. I didn't get a huge kick with spicyness but the flavor is delicious. I use it on foods I would use Lousiana Hot Sauce. The reason being is cause this sauce taste strongly of that sauce, but what can you expect from a 'Cajun' hot sauce. Now if only the bottle was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good sauce but not very spicy
customer_reviews.text: Good sauce but not very spicy. Great for those wanting a mild sauce. Next time I get something with more heat.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Better than having your brains eaten!
customer_reviews.text: Having been a hot sauce aficionado, since soon after nursing a bottle, this stuff has some killer flavors! This is one of the best hot sauces I have ever purchased! I use it on nearly everything! I will certainly be buying more to please my taste buds and advert any possibility of being eaten by a zombie!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisbeme

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTE AND CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend, I decided to purchase this hot sauce. One of the best hot sauces I have ever tasted. I put it on everything from breakfast, lunch and dinner. I now plan on using this normally on meals like I would w/ big brand hot sauces like Franks and Tabasco. I would like to add that the customer service is great. Being that I purchased this online I was expecting an automated email asking to rate it, but instead the owner emailed me personally asking how I liked it. 5 out 5 in taste and flavor, recommended to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: love this hot sauce, not too hot not mild. my husband agrees and we will be purchasing more ! the company actually sent me a personal email asking my opinion of their product. this makes a world of difference to me as there is no such thing as good customer service with most places.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lawburgh

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite hot sauce!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect spiced sauce. It's good on EVERYTHING. It's rich and thick but not chewy. Delicious. It's an added bonus that I no longer have to fear the zombie apocalypse. Zombie free is the way to be!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Just like Tabasco but WAY better
customer_reviews.text: If you like Tabasco, you'll LOVE this stuff. It's essentially a better version of Tabasco - more flavor and better heat. Zombie Cajun is very versatile and has gone great on everything - pizzas, burgers, eggs, hash browns, tacos, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am somewhat of a hot sauce freak and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat of a hot sauce freak and I must say this hot sauce is to die for! (Pun intended) I have almost polished off the whole bottle in just a few days. The flavor and head match perfectly together. I definitely plan on purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: mrrssy

customer_reviews.title: Don't tell Frank!
customer_reviews.text: I'm ordering more of this stuff! It's really good. It's got a great flavor profile and a bit of heat. I think I actually prefer it over good old franks hot sauce...
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: Very good! Not really "hot" at all
customer_reviews.text: I did like it! I'd even order it again! Truthfully, as someone who is not usually a huge fan of really spicy food.. I still kind of wish this was a little more spicy, however. Maybe I will try another "degree" of the same brand?
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Not too spicy but great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Not very spicy but adds a nice flavor to food. I'm about ready to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: I didn't really like the taste
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really like the taste. I don't like hot sauce with that vinegar taste in it. It didn't have a lot on vinegar but enough that I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fun Novelty Gift, but, SURPRISE, it tastes really great too!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby's 50th was last week and I wanted to give him 50 gifts to commemorate the event. This was a novelty gift, because he's such a zombie comic book fan. Surprise, that it was a delicious sauce. My daughter and him are quite the connoisseur of hot sauces and it got some big thumbs up from them. It's not terribly hot but big on flavor which I liked as well. In case of apocalypse, the bottle is plastic so you can run and fight and still have sauce to put on your roasted squirrel or rabbit as the case may be.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Combines My Two Favorite Things Hot Sauce and Zombies
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hot sauce. Most hot sauces are just hot without much flavor. Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce doesn't fall into that trap. It is full of great flavor and I'm glad I ordered the 10 oz. bottle. I've been going through it much faster than I thought I would. I've been using this on turkey burgers, chicken strips, and regular burgers. Going to be testing this on chili next.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Sauce!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce as a Christmas present. The flavor is really good, and I liked it! I liked that the sauce was spicy, but didn’t have an overload of heat. Very good all around. I’ll be trying the Zombie “Lagniappe” Hot Pepper sauce next.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Cajun Zombie Hot Sauce is the Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! Now this is hot sauce! Seriously, this is really good. I put it on some grilled chicken and oh my gosh, I think I have developed a new addiction. Let me know if you ever need a professional taste tester, I am NOT a zombie, but I do know good hot sauce when I get it and this is absolutely sensational!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A far superior flavor to the large commercial sauces you will find in the stores and the heat level is actually more mild than most hot sauces I'be tried. I can't get over how good this stuff is I emptied my first bottle in 3 days. The best meal I made with it so far is tacos and should you choose to do this don't be afraid to pour this sauce on thick. As for their customer service it is nothing short of awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Hawt sauce
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought this hot sauce for my husband's dad, when we opened the package it came in ol butterfingers dropped it and cracked the top.lucky for us we did, because we decided to keep it. This hot sauce is perfect, nice and rich aroma,tastes good on pizza and even vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: babyotterz

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift.
customer_reviews.text: My dad is going to love this. Great Christmas gift for the hot sauce fan in your life. Fast shipping and very reasonable pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good but not very hot
customer_reviews.text: Bought as secret Santa gift. Receiver (who loves hot sauces) said flavor was good but not very hot
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D.

customer_reviews.title: nice change of pace from tabasco
customer_reviews.text: This sauce is a nice change of pace from other hot sauces with high vinegar. it has a little spice, a little tang, and a bit of depth to the flavor. Goes great on fries
customer_reviews.author: henri wannabe

customer_reviews.title: It's all about the flavor
customer_reviews.text: The Zombie Cajun hot sauce is like the red Tabasco but without the burn - it's all about the flavor! I have other hot sauces for the heat, but when you just want the flavor for those who can't take the heat, keep this one in your arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: LostInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: hot sauce
customer_reviews.text: I love good flavorful hot sauce that is not overpowered by the HEAT alone. Cajun Zombie sauce is flavor filled with a nice heat following. I've put it on many things & love it. It's my new favorite when it comes to Hot Sauce!
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Damn Good!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sauce for a friend of mine as a thank you. This guy east jalapenos for breakfast, lol you get the idea! I asked him how he liked it and that was his very simple, yet informative answer. It's "Damn Good"! I know if you enjoy "hot" that this is something you have to try. It certainly passed my friends review, no contest!! I'll be ordering more for him. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Many

customer_reviews.title: True to its name!!
customer_reviews.text: Got my sauce delivered in insanely short time (I ordered it on Sunday and it arrived Monday). Put it to quick use, and it was true to its name: "Zombie Apocalypse Survival Kit". It has taken a very worthy and prominent spot in my hot sauce collection.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: Great pepper flavor and well balanced heat!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hot sauce!! I really love the balance of pepper flavor and heat.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This hot sauce makes the best damn hot wing sauce. Eeeeveeer. Seriously, the right amount of heat and amazing flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Great taste with a mild heat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hot sauce because my wife and I are into Zombie films and I thought what a great gift. She has never been a fan of really hot stuff but she absolutely LOVES Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce! It is mild enough that she eats it every day! No joke. The sauce has so much flavor and doesn't ruin the food with too much heat. We are on our second bottle now, and we have 3 more going out as gifts. We would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jody B.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and husband love this. They're putting it on everything
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and husband love this. They're putting it on everything, instead of the normal Frank's Hot Sauce or Tobasco. It's so spicy you can smell it when the bottle's opend.
customer_reviews.author: 3girlsmom

customer_reviews.title: Can't Get Enough of This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bottle, ate it in five days, just ordered the 4-pack!
customer_reviews.author: Don Winkleblech

customer_reviews.title: Cool Concept - and comes with a short story
customer_reviews.text: The novelty of the item is great for Zombie lovers. The story was creative and a nice added touch. The sauce is a little on the vinegary side for us.
customer_reviews.author: NBG

customer_reviews.title: My Family Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: A spicy way to start your day, especially when you lavish it on your eggs in the morning. My guys use this sauce on just about everything. Better than tobasco sauce, just the right blend for cajun pepper sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great hot sauce!
customer_reviews.text: Received very quickly. Promptly tested it out and wow! Great flavor, nice kick to it, and not overbearingly spicy. I will be adding this to my usual stock of hot sauces.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and not too hot just a nice kick
customer_reviews.text: Yum! Great flavor and not too hot just a nice kick. Love it
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sauce for my wife who says it is “yummy delish!” I tried it myself this morning with steak and eggs. Let me just say, this stuff is very tasty! Not too hot and not too mild! Really just an all-around good sauce if you ask me! I just ordered the Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce Gourmet Food Gifts Basket Set here on Amazon and can’t wait to get into some more of that Zombie Cajun hot sauce!
customer_reviews.author: BigMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL SAUCE!! Enough heat to be interesting, but not so much as to mask the flavor. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Moore

customer_reviews.title: Better then Louisiana
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite hot sauce on the market. If you haven't tried this sauce yet you have no idea of what flavor is. Buy this product now while you still can.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Caslavka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This hot sauce is AWESOME. We put it on everything. Tastes similar to franks red hot but better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Sauce's Flavor is "Just Right"
customer_reviews.text: This new sauce has just about the right heat (not too hot), but has a great flavor so that it can be used very liberally in many things! I have always avoided those sauces with too much of a "vinegar" taste, but Zombie Cajun has found the right mix to now be one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: SmmrHill

customer_reviews.title: Lots of flavor, not just heat!
customer_reviews.text: We buy this over and over again because it does have flavor and not just heat. We use it on everything from eggs to meat to vegg, etc. And, hey, if Tim McGraw likes it, how can that be bad!
customer_reviews.author: Robarkel

customer_reviews.title: Great sauce
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sauce for my 20 year old son for Christmas. He tried it this morning and loved it! If you are looking for a hot sauce with good flavor I recommend this one...
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This sauce has fantastic flavor...it's more than just a "hot" sauce. I originally bought it because of the name and the fun label, but it has now become a staple in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brainerd

customer_reviews.title: bites back
customer_reviews.text: Zombie is good not as thick as I was hoping but still good has a great kick to it ... again this s one that bites and bites again
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of heat
customer_reviews.text: I love a little kick to my food and Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce gives me just that. It has more flavor and tastes 'fresher' than the name brand found in stores. If you love hot sauce, give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: D Zuna

customer_reviews.title: Best new sauce in a while!
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself a Christmas present of various hot sauces. This was best of the bunch and the rest were damn good as well. Nice balance of savory and heat. Wish it was in glass but that is the only thing I would change. Will try the other varieties from Zombie most likely soon.
customer_reviews.author: jason mcmurray

customer_reviews.title: One of the better hot sauces of its kind if not the best
customer_reviews.text: One of the better hot sauces of its kind if not the best. The owner also contacted me via email to ask for my feedback which is always a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this and is ready for his next bottle, as he puts hot sauce on everything!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Lee

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sauce.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic flavor. Perfect amount of heat, with no pain. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: tasty sauce
customer_reviews.text: I love trying new things. This hot sauce has a unique zombie theme with a great flavor and some zig!
customer_reviews.author: Karmel Bellew

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hot sauce, I use this on everything. The only bad is that it doesn't come in a bigger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: AMKiDD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Hot sauce is amazing. I add it to everything
customer_reviews.author: jbclark

customer_reviews.title: Not very hot, but still pretty tasty
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed by Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce. And in fact I would not really consider it "hot sauce" to begin with. It has a mild heat to it but is significantly milder than something like Tabasco. It is really more like a watery, vinegary/peppery ketchup. Having said that, if you go into it not expecting heat, the taste is actually pretty balanced and not too bad. Sort of a milder version of Tabasco. I can see it having its uses...but I don't think it's good enough to merit ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product very hot
customer_reviews.text: Great product very hot pepper and very tasty flavor great value i hoppe buy another very soon and i send to a friends others
customer_reviews.author: felipe

customer_reviews.title: Great sauce for Zombie Apocalypse.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of hot sauces over the years. This is one of the best. It has moderate spiciness with just the right amount of acidity. Good texture in an easy to pour squeeze bottle. I wish I could buy this in a larger bottle since I use it often on just about everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and a great hot sauce. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exceptional
customer_reviews.text: First taste of this sauce told me a lot. Heat was medium and the favor was excellent. Some sauces tend to be one or the other. This one has an excellent blend of both. It's not blazing hot, but there's a define kick, and the taste is an A plus. This is a great every day sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST Hot Sauce!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the absolutely BEST hot sauce on this planet!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori C

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Spicy enough to add delicious flavor without making me crave milk. Apparently nine more words were required; this makes nine!
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaSun77

customer_reviews.title: Deeeleeescious!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hot sauce is packed with flavor...perfect for cooking all sorts of dishes and ALL types of foods! I'm now ready for the Apocaplypse
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Good Sauce
customer_reviews.text: A bit too thin and vinegary for my taste but a friend loved it so I gave it to her.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. West

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I made a gift bag of hotsauce and my daughter loved it thank you somuch for giving her a new one to try
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Reed

customer_reviews.title: SPECTACULAR!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my brother as part of his Christmas gifts. He loves it so much! He says he could drink it straight. It is darn good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for shipping
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this product as something to purchase online because it is packaged in the absolute flimsiest plastic bottle I've ever seen, so of course it showed up with hot sauce all dripped down the sides and crusted on. I had to throw it out, so I can't comment on flavor.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sauce, it has a really great taste
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sauce, it has a really great taste. I would recommend it. I got if for Christmas gift and I have bought 2 more since then!
customer_reviews.author: tyuygh

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, very little heat
customer_reviews.text: This sauce augments the flavor of the food and adds a great flavor all of it's own with just a little "heat". This is similar to another Louisiana hot sauce, without as much of a vinegar flavor.
customer_reviews.author: William Henker

customer_reviews.title: Greatest hot sauce ever!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this product,I had a problem through amazon but after I vente my frustration. They sent me one that was unopened an this was by far the greatest hot sauce I have ever had!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kalinowski

customer_reviews.title: Very Good flavor little heat
customer_reviews.text: This sauce has a lot of taste without overpowering heat. I enjoy this better with eggs than tobasco and is mild enough my kids enjoy the sauce too edit: fix auto correct spelling
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is the perfect addition to my roasted vegetable soup with rice and I'm looking forward to trying it on other dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Don't be scared.
customer_reviews.text: This sauce has the best flavor. You won't be disappointed! I love it on pizza. Makes a great hostess gift. I will be gifting some this Christmas and try out more flavors in the future. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite Hot Sauce!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! This is my new go to hot sauce. Perfect blend of flavor and heat. I will make sure I always keep a bottle in the house for my favorite foods, and to keep the zombies away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Garry Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Best Hot Sauce Ever
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing on anything! I've used it on every type of meat, fish, and vegetable with equally delicious results. Just enough heat to get your motor running and hopefully keep the Zombies at bay....
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT CUCULLU

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. Just not at all spicey. And tastes a little strong of vinegar to me. Similar to tabasco but more mild. I'll use it but will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great hot sauce!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sauce!! Bought it for my uncle and he has used half of it in 2 days. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad it was cheap. A little more spice than kechup. It does have a cajun flavor but don't think of this as a hot sauce as I did. On the heat scale it would be way down near the bottom. I used it as I would Tabasco Sauce and was no where near it. Even their Chipotle Sauce is hotter. Can be used as a cajun sauce I guess. Maybe in days gone by they made a good hot sauce but not now. Filed in the recycle bin.
customer_reviews.author: Jimnh1

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for the 1st time a few weeks ago and really like it. It is not too hot but has great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Al Swearengin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sauce!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Sauce that has an excellent flavor and enjoyable heat that improves your dish. Will certainly buy more in the future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: WOW Zombie Cajun !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a delicious sauce with Great Flavor on anything !!!we Love it and so do our kids ! Great Flavor without to much Heat !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Hot sauce for the end of all ends
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is subtle and crazy at the same time . Added to any dish,it's flavor imparts a hotness but yet doesn't over power .
customer_reviews.author: olive laurene mccune

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my boyfriend and he really loved it, i think it just found its way as a regular household sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Yake

product_meta.title: Zombie Cajun Hot Sauces - Not Just a Novelty Gift For a Zombie Survival Kit - Best Bottles Of Louisiana Spiced Aged Pepper Mash for Injector Recipes, Grilling, Marinades, and Seasoning (4 pack of 6oz)
feature_bullets: Perfect Zombie Gift for the Zombie Apocalypse Prepper.
Zombie Cajun Hot Sauce is a Louisiana style hot sauce made from Cayenne peppers. It is more flavorful than most of the Louisiana style sauces.
It is made from an exceptionally high quality aged pepper mash.
It doesn't bring the heat, rating about a 5 in heat on a scale from 1 to 10. It's all about the rich Cajun flavor.

PERFECT GIFT for any fun holiday occasion for both men & women alike, him or her. It's not your typical cheap novelty gag gift for dad & mom. Some great ideas include Birthday, Graduation, Housewarming or Wedding registry presents for a couple. Excellent for brother, sister, grandma, grandpa, husband, wife, son, daughter, girlfriend, boyfriend and any best friend or family member. Christmas is here, keep it under $30, 25, 20, or even 15 for White Elephant, Yankee Swap, & Secret Santa exchange.
